No. 46658)} Sub: Interest Rate Applicable for HAM Projects-Interest under clause 23.6.4 This is with regard to the amended Model Concession Agreement for Hybrid Annuity Model Projects. As per the requirement of Article 23.6.4 "Interest shall be due and payable on the reducing balance of Completion Cost at an interest rate equal to the average of one-year MCLR of 5 Scheduled Commercial Banks plus 1.25%" The foot note specifies that The  Authority shall declare the list  of 5 Schedule Commercial Bank on 1st September every calendar year based on the balance sheet size as declared in their annual reports. The 1-year MCLR of the top 5 Scheduled commercial banks shall be taken at the start of every quarter". 2. Accordingly, Authority hereby declare the 5 Schedule Commercial banks along with one year MCLR (Rate of Interest) applicable as on 1st April, 2024. The list of banks shall be next reviewed on 1st September 2024 and the rates shall be published for 1st of every quarter. 3 The rates for the top 5 commercial banks are as below: Sr. No. Name of the Bank One Year MCLR in % Average Rate Applicable (As on 01.04.2024) for the period 01.04.2024 to 30.06.2024 State Bank of India 8.65 2 HDFC Bank 9.30 3 ICICI Bank 9.10 8.93% p.a: Plus 1.25% Bank of Baroda 8.80 5 PNB 8.80 4 This issues with the approval of Competent Authority.
